report.title: MTT Society Slot at All India Student Young Professional Women In Engineering Congress 2019

description.text: <p>MTT Society slot at&nbsp;All India Student Young Professional Women In Engineering Congress 2019 during 28-30 Sept, 2019 at Hyderabad. In the slot 2 technical lectures were delivered to the audience of the congress.&nbsp;</p>

Importance of research in RF and Microwave Engineering

description.text: <p>10TH HYDERABAD SECTION MEETING, 2019 SLATE</p>

report.title: Faculty Development Program on ‘Algodynamics’ approach to Teaching Algorithms

description.text: <p>An approach to teaching algorithms in Computer Science. &ldquo;Algodynamics&rdquo; applies system&nbsp;dynamics approach to describe and teach algorithms and aims to address the challenges in traditional methods of teaching&nbsp;Algorithms.&nbsp;<strong>The approach holds promise, specifically with the availability of interactive&nbsp;Virtual Labs in Data Structures and Algorithms.</strong></p>

report.keywords: FDP, Algodynamics, Teaching Algorithms, System Dynamics
report.cosponsor_name: International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad

description.text: <p>11TH HYDERABAD SECTION MEETING, 2019 SLATE</p>

report.title: Recent advacnes in Antennas & Microwave Ciruits with applications & Simulaion studies

description.text: <p>This&nbsp; three day&nbsp; workshop&nbsp; enhacnes&nbsp; the skills&nbsp; of&nbsp; Research schoars and&nbsp; faculty &amp; Industry experts&nbsp; in the&nbsp; angle of&nbsp; latest&nbsp; trends and advaces&nbsp; in technology not only but also&nbsp; the&nbsp; design perspective&nbsp; too;&nbsp; the&nbsp; experts&nbsp; in this field are&nbsp; thrwon some light on&nbsp; recent advacnes in&nbsp; Mirowave&nbsp; antennas and&nbsp; antenna&nbsp; arrays&nbsp; which are useful&nbsp; in&nbsp; industry&nbsp; like satellite&nbsp; on baord and phased arrays&nbsp; in Radar appliations too;</p>

report.keywords: antennaa; minaturaiation ; microwaves; attnuation; lossess; radiation; phase

topic.title: SN Member Role and Opportunities

description.text: <p>Theres is every need to improve the professional knoledge in the functioning of a Student Branch.&nbsp; Some of the SB Counselors are new and hence this SB Couselors meet is proposed Many topics including&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 12pt;">Role and Responsibilities of a IEEE Student Branch Couselor,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Officer Reporting,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Annual Plan Submission, L31 Filing,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">vTools,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Rebate,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Awards,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Chapters and AG formation,</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Competitions and Accounting are discussed.&nbsp; Q&amp;A session is also organized.&nbsp;</span></p>

topic.title: Role and Responsibilities, Officer Reporting, Annual Plan, Chapters and AG Formation
L-31, vTools, Rebate, Competitions and Accounting

report.title: SN Members Meeting for SSR and JSSR Selection Process

topic.title: Section Student Rep, JSSR, ZSR SN Members Role

report.title: How to Create a Professional Resume

description.text: <p>Meant for About-to-Graduate IEEE student members and recently graduate IEEE Young Professionals, this Webinar from Experienced HR leader Anita Shelton informs you about how to build a resume that impresses the reader. It will show that you are a professional and right for the job. Normally students really need to know what and how to put their knowledge into a resume.&nbsp;</p>

topic.title: How to create a Professional Resume

description.text: <p>IEEE Hyderabad section for taking up the responsibility and supporting us as Technology&nbsp; partner&nbsp; for the launch of "Telangana's biggest online hackathon," I - Innovate in the webinar : Innovation -&nbsp; need of the hour, happening today at&nbsp;<strong>04 : 15 PM to 05 :30 PM</strong>&nbsp;addressed by Mr Ravi Narayan, CIO, TSIC, CEO ,T - HUB supported by Telangana State Innovation cell [TSIC] and Telangana Information Technology Association [TITA] organised by Publishsutra.&nbsp;</p>

topic.title: Innovation - need of the hour
